title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: Upon launching the Help view, it requires clicking on a 'live' area before becoming responsive to keyboard navigation.
EB: We should ensure that the Help view starts in a state where it can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view. 
2. Observe the need to click on a 'live' area for responsiveness.
3. Expected behavior: The Help view should be navigable via the keyboard without requiring an initial click on any specific area.
